articles.author: Edd Straw
articles.title: What we learned from F1's raucous first 2024 sprint race - The Race
articles.description: Though the final Chinese Grand Prix sprint race result wasn't a shock, the route to it contained some excellent action. Here's what it told us about Formula 1's revised sprint format
articles.content: Formula 1's latest adjustments to its sprint race format mean a different position in the weekend for the shortened race and another element of separation from the grand prix with the chance to make … [+6660 chars]
